Ok i had to write this comment.I came from a private school.I had a great edjucation.Yes That is how you spell that word.If you see anything spells otherwise read the word out.It is spelled wrong.Not Education.Pronounce the word.If you see a school spelling there name that way.Find a different school!

Now.The biggest problem is.Federal Government managing your school system.There is no workaround for this.Homeschooling is your best bet.Get the books you need to edjucate your kids.Schools do not work effectively.Sending your kids to college for a job is bullcrap.You should be teaching your kids to start their own business.Not get a job.Your aspect of your kids went from "Be proud be special.Work hard to become the best." too.   " Get a job. Don't come to me for help.Figure it out on your own."When you are the one who sent them to that crappy school in the first place. 

You need to be supporting your kids every step of the way.You kids are going to make mistakes.Of course. Why? Because the lack the mental control to stay focused. Because you keep feeding them crap every morning. Sugar is not brain food its a drug you were feed every morning by your parents. WTF makes you think that's what your kids should be eating?

The majority of your kids functions an capabilities are from the foods they eat. Go to the Youtube Channel. Warsun99 Check out the videos. An read the comments. You will get a good idea of what is causing your kids to fall behind.An as stated in this video. Feel like they're running but going nowhere.

Other countries like China with their edjucation are getting higher grades. Sure.Because they are not the producers of toxic foods which are flooded in poor medium and high level neighborhoods. See the videos. Scroll through them.You will find your answers. As for Whats causing you and your kids to look older. Look up rBST side effects. It is simple. Do not let your kids drink milk or eat the meals at their schools. Send them to school with their own lunch.If you have a family member with no computer? Buy them one.

 Make sure they get the internet. Tell them to buy computer programs rather than send them to school.They learn FASTER that way! It is that simple people.
